entry.title: Open Access Journal: Meroitic Newsletter
entry.content:
The Meroitic Newsletter - A Digital Compilation
Compiled by Reginald Smith Email
Dedicated to all Meroitic Scholars, especially the recently passed Dr. Bruce Trigger
Compiler's Notes
My Papers*NEW* My paper(s) on Meroitic (not affiliated with the Meroitic Newsletter or the Institut de France)
Technical Note: This software requires that you have both a web browser and Adobe Acrobat's PDF Reader Installed. If you do not have the reader install it from the web page here. Some users have reported that the links do not always link directly to the article in the PDF but only the first page. This bug is present in some earlier editions of the Adobe Acrobat Reader. I highly recommend you download the latest version (version 8).
